name: 馬尚智
objective: 授課內容涵蓋適用於通訊系統之數學工具、各種類比通訊系統相關架構及其工作原理。主要目標為讓學生瞭解通訊系統之基本原理、分析方法以及系統架構。
schedule:
I. Fundamentals of signal and system analysis (1st wk ~ 3rd wk)
1.　　Signal models
2.　　Signal classifications
3.　　Fourier Series
4.　　The Fourier transform
5.　　Signals and Linear systems
6.　　Sampling theory
7.　　The Hilbert Transform
II. Modulation techniques with emphasis on analog systems (4th wk ~ 9th wk)
1.　　Linear modulation
2.　　Angle modulation
3.　　Analog pulse modulation
4.　　Delta modulation and PCM
5.　　Multiplexing
III. Stochastic processes (10th wk ~ 13th wk)
1.　　A brief review of probability theory
2.　　Some terminology of random processes
3.　　Correlation and power spectral density
4.　　Linear systems and random processes
5.　　Narrowband noise
IV. Noise effects in simple modulation systems (14th wk ~ 18th wk)
1.　　Signal-to-Noise ratios
2.　　Noise in coherent systems
3.　　Noise in angle modulation
4.　　Noise in pulse-code modulation
scorePolicy:
平時成績  30 %
期中考    30 %
期末考    40 %
materials:
Principles of Communications Systems, Modulation, and Noise
(6th edition)   by Rodger E. Ziemer and William H. Tranter
